title: Membership
description: Become a member of the YeaHub community and get access to all the features of the platform. The membership fee helps develop the platform, add new functions and support members

modal.title: Unsubscribe
modal.description: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone. Your subscription will be canceled.

greeting: Excellent choice, now you have access to all the functions of the service
renewal: Payment will be renewed automatically on {{Date}}
canceled: You have canceled your subscription. Full access will be available until {{Date}}.
accessWarning: Renew your subscription for full access

first.question: How much does membership cost?
first.answer: The membership fee is {{price}} rubles per month. This allows you to use all the features of the platform, including premium content and participation in closed events.

second.question: What are the advantages of membership?
second.answer: Membership opens up a wide range of materials, exclusive collections and activities, as well as gives you the opportunity to support the development of the community and platform.

third.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
third.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account on the platform. Access to paid materials will be suspended at the end of the current month.

fourth.question: Can I pause my subscription for some time?
fourth.answer: At the moment, subscription pause is not provided. You can cancel your subscription at any time and resubscribe later.

banner.title: Your subscription supports the development of the platform!
banner.list.title: Membership fees help us:
banner.list.first: Buy new interviews and add them to the database.
banner.list.second: Develop new features — task simulators, tests, HH analytics.
banner.list.third: Create mobile applications (iOS/Android is already in the works!).
banner.list.fourth: Expand the team — hire developers to accelerate growth.
banner.list.fifth: Improve content — we are constantly editing, formatting questions.
banner.list.thanks: Thank you for being a part of the community!
